verbose_text: There are also animal studies showed TMP infusion decreases renal potassium excretion by 40% and increases renal sodium excretion by 46%, likely in a dose dependent manner.22 Although standard dose TMP-SMX-induced hyponatremia is rare, it is still worth close attention in clinical practice.
evidence: TMP infusion decreases renal potassium excretion by 40% and increases renal sodium
